CustomField.formula: IF( AND(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_1__c != null, RTL_RelatedOpportunity_1__r.IsClosed, NOT(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_1__r.IsWon)), 1,0) + IF( AND(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_2__c != null, RTL_RelatedOpportunity_2__r.IsClosed, NOT(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_2__r.IsWon)), 1,0) + IF( AND(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_3__c != null, RTL_RelatedOpportunity_3__r.IsClosed, NOT(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_3__r.IsWon)), 1,0) + IF( AND(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_4__c != null, RTL_RelatedOpportunity_4__r.IsClosed, NOT(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_4__r.IsWon)), 1,0) + IF( AND(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_5__c != null, RTL_RelatedOpportunity_5__r.IsClosed, NOT(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_5__r.IsWon)), 1,0)
CustomField.label: Num Closed Lost Opportunities
